Name: Slow Start
Effect: During the first 5 Rounds of a battle, this Pokemon will always go last in the initiative order. After those 5 Rounds are over, Increase 2 points to its Strength and Dexterity Attributes, and it will always go first in the initiative order. This effect resets if the Pokemon is called out of combat.
Description: The Pokemon has remained dormant for thousand of years, its movements are heavy and slow, run away before it unleashes its full power.
